item.description:
Lisa Hall, BostonLOA member and an Abraham Hicks practice-tioner/ coach, is organizing 2 DVD screening events (on Friday, 5/29 & Saturday, 5/30) for her dear friend, Peter Beamish.

Donations will be Appreciated
(For the venue and for Peter in support of travel)

RSVP here so we'll meetup at the Hotel.


**************************************

Friends of the metaphysical, this is something you won’t want to miss!

Two mind-bending evenings.

Two mind-bending films.


Plus - Peter Beamish, the creator, director and host of these shows, will be on hand to answer your questions after each screening!


Friday Night, 5/29: “Introducing Neale Donald Walsch – God’s Latest Scribe”
Go here for details & RSVP: http://lawofattractio...


Saturday Night, 5/30, 7 pm: “Introducing Abraham: The Secret Behind The Secret”

The Secret Behind "The Secret" is the spiritual glue that was missing in “The Secret” blockbuster film.

Described as “the ultimate creation in our age of enlightenment” this fascinating trilogy introduces you personally to Jerry & Esther Hicks and Abraham - a 21st century phenomenon! Jerry & Esther Hicks are the New York Times best selling authors of the “Ask & It Is Given” and “The Law of Attraction”.


More INFO:
Live Interview with Peter Beamish - You Tube
Trailers and Crowd Reactions
Audience Feedback
Aura.ca – the full story
Abraham-Hicks – Official Site

Comments from Esther & Jerry Hicks:
We put Peter Beamish off, when he asked to do this taped interview with us and with Abraham, telling him we just had too much going on. He promised us that he would be brief, could ask the questions and shoot the film all in one day, and so we agreed to do the interview. Not only was Peter true to his word, arriving at our Abraham-Hicks Conference center with a big truck full of cameras, camera men, lighting and all manner of impressive equipment, but his interview questions evoked from us and from Abraham a dynamic interview full of incredible new insights.

As we watch this DVD and relive the interview with Peter plying Abraham with his hard-hitting and broad range of questions, we are reminded again of the brilliance and love of Abraham.

Peter has scored this wonderful trilogy with some of the finest music available on the planet today. The combination of Peter’s remarkable questions, Abraham’s remarkable answers and this amazing blending of music and wonderful photography from Peter’s talented group at Aura Productions, makes this a product we are very proud of.

This interview was taped just a few weeks before Rhonda Byrne (and The Secret film crew) joined us on our Alaskan cruise to film our part of the movie, The Secret. This DVD contains important Source material that was not included in The Secret movie.

***************************************
